page.slogan: Songs have been written in his name, songs sung about him. It's time to let the song he taught all of Turkey reach Europe now...
page.mailNotify: Would you like to be notified when it arrives?
page.youCanAddVideo: You can add the video you want to see on the site. Only high-quality videos will be approved and showcased.

developer.coffeIsCheap: Coffee is cheap, but what about code?
developer.buyMeCoffe: Click and treat me to a coffee.
developer.name: Kürşat Şimşek
developer.about: I'm a software developer; sometimes inspiration strikes, and I develop projects. Also, I'm an engineering student. I never miss Galatasaray matches. I love the entire team, but I love Icardi separately.
developer.contactMe: I'm open to feedback and new ideas. You can reach me through the links below.
